subject: [Radiance-general] 2.5-phase method and gendaymtx
body:
There's no -5 or -s option for genskyvec. And from what I can tell the -d
and -c options operate differently in genskyvec, so that -c doesn't negate
-d.

Greg, am I right?

Andy
